page.title: 03CLUBS IN THE W.BRAD'RD AREA
page.content: Agricultural organisations exist for men,women and teenagers.Clubs exist for ornithologists,budgerigar owners,pigeon fanciers and poultry specialists.The Mid-Pennine Arts Assoc.promote Arts and Theatres.Wadd'ton Drama Group attracts local dramatists.Church organisations have a voice in the Ribble Vall.Church Council.A local farmerÂ£s wife promotes W.Bradford Methodist Ladies Bright Hour.Hobbies such as Bridge,Chess,Scot- tish and Morris Dancing,Bellringing, Photography,Painting,Natural History, Modelmaking,Embroidery,Football,Hunting Gardening,Horticulture,Shooting and Vintage vehicles are catered for.Men's clubs include the Royal British Legion, Round Table,Lions and Rotary.Women choose the Women's Institute,Luncheon Club or W.Bradford Young wives,whilst Scouts,Cubs,Brownies and Guides attract the young.Samaritans offer social help.
